title: Magnesium-enriched deep-sea water inhibits NLRP3 inflammasome activation and dampens inflammation
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Hsueh-Hsiao Wang, Chi-Ruei Huang, Hsin-Chung Lin, Hsin-An Lin, Yu-Jen Chen, Kuen-Jou Tsai, Chieh-Tien Shih, Kuo-Yang Huang, David M. Ojcius, Ming-Hang Tsai, Kuang-Wen Tseng, Lih-Chyang Chen
